title: 3D Digital Game-Based Humanities Learning Design: Short-Intensive Course Linked to Science Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and general understanding of humanities
context.additional_context: Game-based learning design reinterpreting science curricula through humanities approaches (literature/history contexts) in a smartphone-centric, technology-limited environment

learning_goals: Learners can construct storytelling that links scientific concepts to their historical development in a 3D virtual space.
Learners can build knowledge-sharing networks with peers using in-game collaboration tools and solve scientific problems.
Learners can complete humanities-science integrated tasks while manipulating 3D game interfaces operating in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
